questions.text: Who is known as the 'King of Pop'?
questions.explanation: Michael Jackson dominated the 80s with 'Thriller', the best-selling album of all time.

questions.text: Which song was the first video ever played on MTV?
questions.explanation: The Buggles' 'Video Killed the Radio Star' aired at 12:01 AM on August 1, 1981.
'Like a Virgin' was one of her biggest hits and the title of her second album.
Journey released this enduring anthem in 1981.
Prince and the Revolution released 'Purple Rain' as the soundtrack to the film of the same name.

questions.text: Which band had a hit with 'Sweet Child o' Mine'?
questions.explanation: Guns N' Roses released this hit in 1987 on 'Appetite for Destruction'.

questions.text: Who sang 'Girls Just Want to Have Fun'?
questions.explanation: Cyndi Lauper's 1983 hit became a feminist anthem.

questions.text: Which Norwegian band is famous for the song 'Take On Me'?
questions.explanation: A-ha's 'Take On Me' is famous for its groundbreaking rotoscoped music video.

questions.text: Who Rick-rolled the world with 'Never Gonna Give You Up'?
questions.explanation: Rick Astley released this stock-Aitken-Waterman hit in 1987.

questions.text: Which charity supergroup recorded 'Do They Know It's Christmas?'
questions.explanation: Bob Geldof organized Band Aid in 1984 to raise money for famine relief in Ethiopia.

questions.text: Whitney Houston released 'I Wanna Dance with Somebody' in which year?
questions.explanation: It was the lead single from her second studio album 'Whitney' (1987).
Bon Jovi's signature song tells the story of Tommy and Gina.

questions.text: Which artist released the album 'Born in the U.S.A.'?
questions.explanation: The Boss released this massive album in 1984.

questions.text: What is the best-selling 12-inch single of all time?
questions.explanation: New Order's 'Blue Monday' is the best-selling 12-inch single in UK history.

questions.text: Who performed the 'Moonwalk' for the first time during the 'Motown 25' special?
questions.explanation: Michael Jackson debuted the move while performing 'Billie Jean' in 1983.
